channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Heard on the Street's Stock-Picking Contest
item.description: Read about our columnists’ favorite and least-favorite stocks and see how they have performed.

item.title: The Score: Trump Media & Technology, American Airlines, Gap and More Stocks That Defined the Week
item.description: Here are some of the major companies whose stocks moved on the week’s news.

item.title: OPEC leaves forecast for demand-growth unchanged
Dow Rises, Stocks Log Monthly Gains
item.description: A late-day rally helped all three major stock indexes finish May higher. Gap shares surged after the clothing retailer posted strong results.

item.title: Monster Beverage’s stock up 1.4% after company announces Dutch auction tender offer for up to $3 billion of its own stock
Boston Beer in Talks to Sell Itself to Jim Beam Owner Suntory
item.description: Japanese whisky-maker Suntory is in talks to acquire Boston Beer, the American brewer known for its Samuel Adams brand.

item.title: Cigna’s stock jumps 2.7% after earnings beat estimates and company raises guidance
When Past Performance Doesn't Even Predict Past Performance
item.description: Wall Street likes to tout returns it didn’t actually produce. You need to ask some important follow-up questions.

item.title: Dropbox says cybersecurity incident is unlikely to have a material impact on operations
